full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: 23375-240150-A In-line Process Heater**
==============================================

### Background Information

This amendment to the tender announcement pertains to the supply of one in-line process heater for the Department of Natural Resources at 1 Haanel Drive, Ottawa, Ontario.

### Tender Award Details

*   **Reference Number**: WS4127442693-Doc4298743101
*   **Publication Date**: November 8, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 28, 2023 at 14:00:00 EST
*   **Amendment Date**: December 19, 2023

### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Category**: Government Department
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Delivery and Installation

The successful bidder will be required to deliver and install one in-line process heater at the Department of Natural Resources location at 1 Haanel Drive, Ottawa, Ontario.

### Trade Agreements

*   **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)** and other relevant trade agreements will apply.

### Packaging Information

The bidder is encouraged to use environmentally preferable packaging for all packaged goods to be delivered to the end user as part of this procurement.

### Key Contact Information

If you have any questions, kindly contact the following person:

*   **Name**: Bobbi MacLeod
*   **Email**: bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: 1-873-3541451
*   **Notice URL**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17955490?extsite=MTc5NTU0OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
*   **Postponed Closing Time**: December 28, 2023, 14:00:00 EST. All bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. 

### Additional Notes

Green Procurement - Environmentally Preferable Packaging. As per the Greening Government Strategy: A Government of Canada Directive and the Ocean Plastics Charter, the bidder is encouraged to use environmentally preferable packaging for all packaged goods to be delivered to the end user as part of this procurement.
